labels.aboutDescription:
Applied Data Scientist and Mechatronics Engineer with experience building data pipelines, predictive models, and monitoring systems for high-reliability, data-intensive environments across industrial and financial domains.

I focus on designing scalable analytics solutions that improve operational efficiency, cost optimization, risk monitoring, and decision-making, combining strong analytical thinking with practical engineering judgment.
labels.projectsSubtitle: Selected work and measurable impact across mining and banking.
labels.stackSubtitle: Tools and technologies I use in production.
labels.contactDescription: Feel free to reach out to me through any of the platforms below or via email.

projects.title: Reverse Sensor Failure Detection
projects.problem: Detect reverse sensor failures before downtime.
highlights: Implemented an algorithm to detect reverse sensor failures with 90% accuracy using GPS data and kinematic models.

projects.title: Near Real-Time Data Quality Monitoring
projects.problem: Plan alarm reporting strategies in near real time.
projects.impact: Near real-time visibility for alarm reporting decisions.
highlights: Built a data quality monitoring system to plan near real-time alarm reporting strategies.

projects.title: Device Health Monitoring Platform - CAS
projects.problem: No centralized view of CAS device health across fleets.
projects.impact: Enabled proactive maintenance and critical asset prioritization.
highlights: Designed a data pipeline and health scoring model for CAS devices, improving fleet visibility and maintenance decisions.

hero.title: CAS Device Health Monitoring Platform
hero.subtitle: Proactive monitoring and health scoring for collision-avoidance devices across industrial fleets.
hero.confidentialNote: Screenshots and diagrams are anonymized due to NDA.

summary.title: Project Summary
summary.subtitle: Quick scan of the core story.

cards.title: Problem
cards.body: Lack of centralized monitoring to understand CAS device health across fleets.

cards.title: Solution
cards.body: Data pipelines with health scoring to unify status, connectivity, and history.

cards.title: Impact
cards.body: Proactive maintenance planning and prioritization of critical devices.

cards.title: Users
cards.body: Reliability engineers and technical support teams.

dashboard.title: Dashboard Preview
dashboard.subtitle: Two key views that drive daily decisions.

views.alt: CAS dashboard overview with connectivity and device health trends
views.title: Connectivity and Fleet Health
bullets: Highlights drop-off trends and devices at risk.
Tracks historical indicators to spot recurring issues.

views.alt: CAS dashboard with per-device variables and daily scores
views.title: Daily Health Scoring
bullets: Guides maintenance scheduling and field checks.

architecture.title: Data & Processing Architecture
architecture.subtitle: From device telemetry to analytics.
architecture.alt: Architecture diagram for CAS data and processing flow
items: Data sources: MongoDB and SQL Server.
Scheduled pipelines for daily ingestion and scoring.
Analytics layer powered by Power BI.

highlights.title: Key Technical Highlights
highlights.subtitle: Engineering choices that shaped the solution.

cards.title: Weighted health scoring
cards.body: 70% hardware signals and 30% connectivity indicators for balanced prioritization.

cards.title: Daily historization
cards.body: Time-series storage to compare current status against long-term behavior.

cards.title: Data quality metrics
cards.body: Freshness, completeness, and anomaly flags embedded in the pipeline.

cards.title: Critical asset ranking
cards.body: Automatic prioritization for field teams and maintenance planning.

cards.title: Maintenance-first design
cards.body: Focused on reducing downtime and guiding preventive actions.

role.title: Role & Responsibilities
role.subtitle: Ownership across data, analytics, and stakeholder support.
items: Modeled and optimized SQL Server storage.
Implemented historization and data quality logic.
Defined technical metrics and health scoring.
Built analytical views for Power BI dashboards.

stack.title: Tech Stack
stack.subtitle: Grouped by the layers used in production.

items: Effective monitoring needs historical context, not just current status.
Data quality is a first-class metric, not a byproduct.
Reducing noise is as important as detecting failures.

projects.title: Mine Sectorization with Graph Clustering
projects.problem: Sectorize the mine into strategic monitoring areas.
projects.impact: Structured monitoring zones using clustering and label propagation.
highlights: Developed a model to sectorize the mine into strategic areas using clustering, graph theory, and label propagation.

projects.title: Operator Alert Monitoring and Driving Score
projects.problem: Score operator driving to take preventive action.
projects.impact: Preventive measures guided by operator alert scoring.
highlights: Built an operator alert monitoring tool that scores driving to support preventive measures.

projects.title: Network Signal Quality Monitoring
projects.problem: Monitor KPIs for field coverage and signal quality.
projects.impact: Automated ETL and dashboards for network KPIs.
highlights: Developed an automated ETL and KPI dashboard to monitor field coverage and signal quality.

projects.title: Over-Indebtedness Detection Model
projects.problem: Detect over-indebted leads with higher separation.
projects.impact: 83% precision and +11% separation between good and bad leads.
highlights: Developed a model to detect over-indebtedness with 83% accuracy and an 11% separation between good and bad leads (up from 5%).

projects.title: Income Inference with Graph Segmentation
projects.problem: Improve income inference accuracy with graph segmentation.
highlights: Complemented the income inference model with a graph-based segmenter, improving accuracy by +2%.

projects.title: ML Controls Monitoring Reports
projects.problem: Detect incidents in monthly ML control execution.
projects.impact: 20+ summarized reports to catch stability and score issues.
highlights: Delivered 20+ summarized reports to detect incidents in monthly execution controls for retail risk and collections ML models.
